newsitem.title: USA: Buenos Aires Embotelladora CEO to resign.
newsitem.headline: Buenos Aires Embotelladora CEO to resign.

text.p: Buenos Aires Embotelladora said on Tuesday that its chief executive, Luis Suarez Clausen, will resign from the company effective July 31.
No successor was named to Suarez's post. Suarez has served as the company's chief executive since July 1996.
"Now that the company's situation has improved, I believe that it is a propitious time to transition to a new chief executive," Suarez said in a written statement.
Buenos Aires Embotelladora also announced on Tuesday that it had reached an agreement with its main financial creditors in Argentina on a comprehensive financial restructuring.
